teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Team Toronto
teams.loan_because: The people who are lucky enough to live in Toronto care about creating a self sustaining legacy in all parts of civilization, and wish that economic conditions in more of the world could be like they are here.
teams.description: This team began with one person, but soon gained strength and momentum through the generosity of the people of Toronto, Canada and their friends. Now this team has over 300 members, has loaned hundreds of thousands of dollars over the past six years and is helping people all over the world. Join us today!!

teams.name: Mars Hill Lending Team
teams.description:
From 2007 to 2012, the Mars Hill community invested $1.2 million dollars to support the efforts of Turame Community Finance in Burundi, Africa. Now we are continuing our involvement with Turame in an even more hands-on-way - by becoming microfinance lenders. 

How to get involved:
1. Click the join team button to the left [if you are new to Kiva you will need to create an account].

2. Choose a Borrower: Check out the current Turame loans by scrolling down at this link: [http://bit.ly/pGU0sd] If there are no new loans, check back in as Turame posts new loans twice a month.

3. Make a Loan:

4. Get Repaid: Over the course of 6 months your loan will get repaid to you in the form of Kiva credit. [This is a loan, not a donation]

5. Repeat.  You can take the money and put it back in your pocket or make a loan to another group.

Thanks for helping support Turame Community Finance in providing loans to those living in one of the poorest countries on the planet. 
You can learn more about Turame here: www.kiva.org/partners/162

teams.name: NWTF PHILIPPINES
teams.loan_because:
1. NWTF can be TRUSTED (see their financial reports pp. 20-21 at their 2010 ANNUAL REPORT. http://nwtf.ph/reports/annual/AR2010.pdf
2. NWTF has more than 25 years of micro-finance EXPERIENCE.
3. NWTF's clients have shown consistent repayment PERFORMANCE (see p.19 of the 2010 ANNUAL REPORT. http://nwtf.ph/reports/annual/AR2010.pdf
teams.description:
VISIT & EXPLORE : www.nwtf.ph
  NWTF has struck me as an organization that has the well-being of its member clients at the heart of all its activities. It is a pioneer in social performance management, and uses the progress out of poverty index (developed by Grameen) to measure a clients' poverty level following each loan cycle." Joanne, Kiva Fellow (volunteer)

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.name: OHIO
teams.loan_because: We are Buckeyes who Care!
teams.description:
Currently, while things may be difficult here in Ohio economically at the moment,,, we know that it may be even more difficult where you are located.

We may be only one state out of fifty  within the United States of America,,, but, we can and do make a difference! 

Why? Because we CARE, and because WE ARE BUCKEYES!!

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

We believe in volunteerism and in supporting local entrepreneurs to a difference in their own lives and strengthen their community. teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

e-man believe that corporate social responsibility is an important part in making this world a better place.

teams.name: Psychologists for peace
teams.loan_because: Research shows that poverty is a major cause of distress and conflict around the world.  Loaning on Kiva allows us to play a small role in promoting peace through the alleviation of poverty.
teams.description: We are an international network of psychologists and related professionals who are interested in promoting peace in the world.  Many of us are also interested in supporting entrepreneurs who have been touched by mental illness and/or entrepreneurs working to provide mental health services in their community.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.loan_because: We believe that creating and growing businesses are the best ways to raise the standards of living in communities.
teams.description: We are a company of creative and dynamic individuals who spearhead the growth of the Erlang programming language around the world. We do this through providing conferences, training, certification, consultancy, support and product development.

teams.name: Krakow.
teams.loan_because: We believe that creating and growing businesses are the best ways to raise the standards of living in communities.
teams.description: We are a company of creative and dynamic individuals who spearhead the growth of the Erlang programming language around the world. We do this through providing conferences, training, certification, consultancy, support and product development.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

teams.name: Mars Hill Lending Team
teams.description:
From 2007 to 2012, the Mars Hill community invested $1.2 million dollars to support the efforts of Turame Community Finance in Burundi, Africa. Now we are continuing our involvement with Turame in an even more hands-on-way - by becoming microfinance lenders. 

How to get involved:
1. Click the join team button to the left [if you are new to Kiva you will need to create an account].

2. Choose a Borrower: Check out the current Turame loans by scrolling down at this link: [http://bit.ly/pGU0sd] If there are no new loans, check back in as Turame posts new loans twice a month.

3. Make a Loan:

4. Get Repaid: Over the course of 6 months your loan will get repaid to you in the form of Kiva credit. [This is a loan, not a donation]

5. Repeat.  You can take the money and put it back in your pocket or make a loan to another group.

Thanks for helping support Turame Community Finance in providing loans to those living in one of the poorest countries on the planet. 
You can learn more about Turame here: www.kiva.org/partners/162

teams.name: St. Timothy's Episcopal Church, Missouri
teams.loan_because: We use the gifts that God has given us to do God's work.
teams.description: We are an Episcopalian community trying to change oppression into opportunity for all of God's people.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:

teams.name: Watch US Leadership Team
teams.loan_because: Nielsen Cares

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.description: A group of coworkers who sell bedding and towels at a major department store and would like to help someone else do the same!

teams.name: Team South Africa
teams.loan_because: Living in a country where millions have grown up under oppression and without privilege or equal opportunity, we as privileged and fortunate South Africans acknowledge our responsibility and relish the opportunity to contribute meaningfully toward the support of entrepreneurial endeavor which would otherwise not have been possible.
teams.description: South Africa is known as "the rainbow nation" as it is a melting pot of cultural, traditional, spiritual, lingual and racial diversity.

teams.name: Pinoys with Promise
teams.loan_because: Everyone has the potential to be great and accomplish remarkable things . Sometimes, a little support and a helping hand is all that it takes to begin a new and exciting journey. Filipinos are incredible people. Full of vibrant care and constantly thinking of new and innovative ideas. Our intentions are to support those individuals who can not fully support themselves. We do this by believing in their visions, their dreams and themselves.
teams.description: Pinoys with Promise is a team dedicated to supporting struggling entrepreneurs that possess great potential and a drive for success. Helping us help others will prove beneficial and advantageous to the thousands of filipinos whose voices can't be heard yet internally strive to do and be more.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Abilene Christian University
teams.loan_because: We are compelled by our life in Jesus Christ to participate in movements that change the lives of others. As a group of alumni, students, staff and faculty, we have been abundantly blessed. The mission of our university community is to educate students for Christian service and leadership throughout the world. Making micro loans through Kiva is simply one way among many by which we are able to actualize our rhetoric.
teams.description:
Mission and Vision:Our mission is to educate students for Christian service and leadership throughout the world.  ACU is a national leader in Christian higher education and a place where students, faculty, staff and alumni change the world.

Our Promise: ACU is a vibrant, innovative, Christ-centered community that engages students in authentic spiritual and intellectual growth, equipping them to make a real difference in the world.

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: Team DDC
teams.loan_because: We believe in helping people who are willing to help themselves. We believe in free enterprise and the strong will of hard working people across the world.
teams.description: We are an online advertising company with a diverse team of people who are smart, driven and passionate about what they do at work and in life.

teams.name: Radialpoint
teams.loan_because: Because sometimes you have to be a loaner in order to bring people together.
teams.description: Dedicated to simplifying peoples digital lives

teams.name: DownloadHelper Users
teams.loan_because:
We think this initiative is in the true spirit of humanity welfare projects like Mozilla Firefox.

We want to provide a strong motivation to DownloadHelper developers to work even harder on new features.

We think we can make a difference.
teams.description: This lending team replaces the donations made to Video DownloadHelper authors to sustain the development of this free software.

teams.loan_because: “He helps others most, who shows them how to help themselves.” A. P. Gouthey
teams.description: As members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, we are Christians and worship Jesus Christ as the Son of God, our Heavenly Father, the Saviour of the world who was born of Mary some 2,000 years ago in Bethlehem. Jesus, through His death and resurrection, is ''the way, the truth and the life'', providing all mankind the ultimate opportunity for salvation and eternal life with our Heavenly Father and His Son.

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Hard work is often not enough to escape poverty and we gladly welcome the opportunity to give people and their businesses a fighting chance. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.whereabouts: Victoria, Vancouver, Edmonton, San Francisco, New York, St-Paul/Minneapolis, Boston
teams.loan_because: We are all family.
teams.description: We are a loving family that is always ready to help each other when in need. We want to extend that caring attitude to people facing challenging circumstances around in the world.

teams.loan_because:

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: W3LL PEOPLE
teams.loan_because: Filled with entrepreneurial spirit and fueled by dreams, we're working to make beauty better. We've been fortunate enough to receive help from friends, family and business partners in realizing those dreams. It seems like the least we can do is pass it along.
teams.description: We're a small team, for now, with big ideas on how to make makeup better.

teams.name: YTMND
teams.loan_because: It's not like we have girls to spend the money on.

teams.description: Diverse group of motivated college students willing to lend a helping hand to those in need.  We are micro-financiers in a macro world.

teams.name: la kumanda'i
teams.loan_because: We understand the importance of micro finance, opportunity and how even a small loan can change the lives of many!
teams.description: A family from NW Florida.

teams.loan_because: Our state rules and we care about the world around us!
teams.description: We are from the great state of California!

teams.name: Catalunya amb Kiva
teams.loan_because: We believe in helping other people. We do not only want Catalunya to be a better place for its citizens, but we want the whole world to be a better place for everyone.
teams.description: Catalunya is a small region in south Europe. We want our culture to be acknowledged all over the world... and we want to stand up and make this world a better place. We believe that Kiva is a good starting point. We believe in Kiva! We, the citizens of Catalonia, want to be committed with everyone. Our language is Catalan. We love Gaudi and his Sagrada Família. We like Miró, Dalí, and Tapies paintings. We listen to Pau Casals, Isaac Albéniz, and Enrique Granados. We build up Castellers, an extraordinary example of what human collaboration can achieve. We dance Sardanes and sing Habaneres. We eat Calçots, Paella, Escudella, Allioli, Panellets, Crema Catalana, Mato, and pa amb tomàquet. La Costa Brava, la Costa Daurada, l'Empordà, els Pirineus... all of them are beautiful places from Catalunya. We live by the Mediterranean sea. We like sports (Barça and Espanyol are two good examples). We believe in people, and thus we like to see how Sagrada Família is being built thanks to the backing of many people. We are ruled by the Generalitat and we drink from the Muga, Fluvià, Ter, Ebre, Llobregat, Besos, Anoia, Segre, Noguera, and we like hiking in Collserola, Tibidabo, Montjuïc, Montserrat, la Pica d'Estats. We ride at Montmelo F1 circuit, we produce Cava and wine in serveral areas (Montsant, Vallès, Alella, Conca de Barbera, Costers del Segre, Emporda, Penedes, Pla de Bages, Priorat i la Terra Alta). We are proud of our land and culture. Everyone is welcome to our home. We live in one of the best places of the world. Let's make the rest of them great too!

teams.name: Brooklyn Represents
teams.loan_because: We are from everywhere, and we are everyone.
teams.description: Brooklyn, New York is home to many immigrants from nations around the world.

teams.name: Fans of Banco D-MIRO
teams.loan_because: we want to improve the quality of life in marginalized areas of the coast of Ecuador.
teams.description: We are fans of D-MIRO because they provide credit to families and microentrepreneurs that have been marginalized from the traditional financial system for different reasons (culture, sex race, poverty, etc).

teams.name: UU Church of Olinda
teams.loan_because: As Unitarian Universalists, we are called upon to be of service to humanity (see uuolinda.org)
teams.description: The UU Church of Olinda exists as a haven of religious freedom, offering fellowship, knowledge and inspiration to all who would seek truth, live responsibly and courageously, and be of service to humanity.

teams.name: Fans of Fundación ESPOIR
teams.loan_because: Small loans can make a big difference.
teams.description: We want to support clients of ESPOIR, one of Kiva's Ecuadorian Field Partners! We beileve in ESPOIR's mission to empower Ecuadorian women through village bank membership, giving clients access to small loans, savings accounts, health education and business training.

teams.name: XCESS expertise center b.v.
teams.loan_because: We think that working together and helping each other will grow the world into a better place.
teams.description: Clients, employees and former employees of XCESS, IT solution provider for Evoq/DNN (DotNetNuke), AFAS Profit and advanced .NET/SQL solutions.

teams.name: EngATech
teams.loan_because:
Our motto as a company has been:
From Struggling, To Stable, To Successful, To Significant.
We sow seeds into others, and expect the harvest.
teams.description: We are a small company that believes in helping those that help themselves grow both personally and professionally.

teams.name: Amy Poehler's Smart Girls
teams.loan_because: You change the world one kind gesture at a time.
teams.description: Amy Poehler's Smart Girls knows there is still inequality all over the world. The basis of that inequality is that you are being denied the ability to be yourself. We must all be be able to make choices that can lead to a better life. Micro-loans make choices available.

teams.name: EY
teams.loan_because: Kiva is well-aligned with what we see as EY's broader corporate responsibility, which is to put our people’s workplace skills toward making a difference in our communities around the world.  We recognize the power of entrepreneurship for job creation and poverty alleviation.
teams.description: EY is one of the largest professional services firms in the world.

teams.name: Finland
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Finland

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?
